title: Estimated decrease of GDP in Japan due to earthquake and tsunami 2011
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The Decrease in billion euros is highest at Category Of Gdp Total and lowest at Category Of Gdp Exports.
The highest Category Of Gdp Total has 68.6 more Decrease in billion euros than the lowest Category Of Gdp Exports.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The Decrease in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Category Of Gdp Total and lowest at Category Of Gdp Exports.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The Decrease in billion euros is highest at Category Of Gdp Total and lowest at Category Of Gdp Exports.
The highest Category Of Gdp Total has 68.6 more Decrease in billion euros than the lowest Category Of Gdp Exports.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Category Of Gdp, and Decrease in billion euros in each Category Of Gdp on the y axis.
Category Of Gdp Total has the highest Decrease in billion euros and Exports has the lowest Decrease in billion euros.
There is a difference of 68.6 between the maximum Category Of Gdp Total and minimum Category Of Gdp Exports.
The Category Of Gdp Total has the highest Decrease in billion euros, followed by Production, and Private consumption. Down to the Category Of Gdp Exports which is the lowest.
The Category Of Gdp Exports has 3.01 times less Decrease in billion euros than average.
